verses.verse: Now the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by the Jordan<WH3383> opposite Jericho,<WH3405> saying,<WH559>

Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

'And the cities<WH5892> which<WH834> you are to give<WH5414> shall be your six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> of refuge.<WH4733>

'But if<WH518> he struck<WH5221> him down<WH5221> with an iron<WH1270> object,<WH3627> so that he died,<WH4191> he is a murderer;<WH7523> the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put<WH4191> to death.<WH4191>

'The blood<WH1818> avenger<WH1350> himself<WH1931> shall put<WH4191> the murderer<WH7523> to death;<WH4191> he shall put<WH4191> him to death<WH4191> when he meets<WH6293> him.
'And if<WH518> he pushed<WH1920> him of hatred,<WH8135> or<WH176> threw<WH7993> something at him lying<WH6660> in wait<WH6660> and [as a result] he died,<WH4191>

'But if<WH518> he pushed<WH1920> him suddenly<WH6621> without<WH3808> enmity,<WH342> or<WH176> threw<WH7993> something<WH3605> <WH3627> at him without<WH3808> lying<WH6660> in wait,<WH6660>

or<WH176> with any<WH3605> deadly<WH834> <WH4191> object of stone,<WH68> and without<WH3808> seeing<WH7200> it dropped<WH5307> on him so that he died,<WH4191> while he was not his enemy<WH340> nor<WH3808> seeking<WH1245> his injury,<WH9567>

'But if<WH518> the manslayer<WH7523> shall at any<WH3318> time<WH3318> go<WH3318> beyond<WH3318> the border<WH1366> of his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> to which<WH834> he may flee,<WH5127>

and the blood<WH1818> avenger<WH1350> finds<WH4672> him outside<WH4480> <WH2351> the border<WH1366> of his city<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> and the blood<WH1818> avenger<WH1350> kills<WH7523> the manslayer,<WH7523> he shall not be guilty of blood<WH1818>

because<WH3588> he should have remained<WH3427> in his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> until<WH5704> the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest.<WH3548> But after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> the manslayer<WH7523> shall return<WH7725> to the land<WH776> of his possession.<WH272>
'And these<WH428> things<WH428> shall be for a statutory<WH2708> ordinance<WH4941> to you throughout your generations<WH1755> in all<WH3605> your dwellings.<WH4186>

'If anyone<WH3605> kills<WH5221> a person,<WH5315> the murderer<WH7523> shall be put<WH7523> to death<WH7523> at the evidence<WH6310> of witnesses,<WH5707> but no<WH3808> person<WH5315> shall be put<WH4191> to death<WH4191> on the testimony<WH6030> of one<WH259> witness.<WH5707>

'And you shall not defile<WH2930> the land<WH776> in which<WH834> you live,<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of which<WH834> I dwell;<WH7931> for I the Lord<WH3068> am dwelling<WH7931> in the midst<WH8432> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>' "
